arts.ttl: Bravo insists Udinese will ‘play to win’ against Milan and admits Ibrahimovic admiration
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Udinese’s Iker Bravo is looking forward to facing AC Milan, insisting that he and his team-mates will play to win. Milan currently sit fifth in the table after consecutive league wins against Lecce and Bologna, but they face a Udinese side who are actually above them in fourth. Runjaic’s men have taken seven points from […] The post Bravo insists Udinese will ‘play to win’ against Milan and admits Ibrahimovic admiration appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: GdS: Predicted XIs for Udinese vs. Milan – Pavlovic recovers to retain place
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher AC Milan head coach Massimiliano Allegri has one more day of training to decide the team to face Udinese, but he already has some ideas. Milan are looking to build on back-to-back wins in Serie A against Lecce (0-2) and Bologna (1-0). The defensive record has been particularly pleasing with three clean sheets in four […] The post GdS: Predicted XIs for Udinese vs. Milan – Pavlovic recovers to retain place appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: AC Milan’s Christopher Nkunku to start from the bench vs Udinese
arts.sum: On Sunday against Bologna, Christopher Nkunku made his official debut for Milan, coming on in the 85th minute in place of Santiago Gimenez. Despite the limited time, the Frenchman made a strong impact and even won a penalty that was shockingly not awarded to the Rossoneri. Nkunku is working hard to reach his peak form: […]
